hero.title: Professional Counseling Services in West Lafayette
hero.subtitle: Take the first step towards healing and growth with compassionate, evidence-based therapy in a warm and welcoming environment.

about.title: About Anisa Counseling Group
about.description: We are a team of licensed mental health professionals dedicated to providing compassionate, personalized care to individuals, couples, and families. Our approach combines evidence-based therapeutic techniques with a deep understanding of each client's unique needs and circumstances.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: We offer a comprehensive range of mental health services tailored to meet your specific needs.

list.name: Individual Therapy
list.description: One-on-one sessions focused on your personal growth and healing journey.

list.name: Couples Therapy
list.description: Strengthen your relationship with guided communication and conflict resolution.

list.name: Family Therapy
list.description: Improve family dynamics and create healthier relationships for all members.

list.name: Group Therapy
list.description: Connect with others facing similar challenges in a supportive group setting.

contact.title: Get Started Today
contact.description: Ready to take the first step? Contact us to schedule your initial consultation.
